title: Fix Admin Add New Product modal background to solid white

requirements.text: In AdminDashboardPage.tsx, replace the transparent/semi-transparent grey background of the 'Add New Product' modal/panel with a solid white background (`bg-white`) so the form fields and content are clearly visible and not blending with the page behind it.

quotes: instead of transparent bg add white bg
the 'Add New Product' modal panel is showing with a transparent/grey background, letting the content behind it bleed through. I'll replace it with a solid white background

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Add New Product' panel/modal has a solid white background with no transparency.
Content behind the modal does not bleed through the panel.
All form fields (Name, SKU, Description, Price, Stock, Category, Image URL) are clearly legible against the white background.
The Cancel and Add Product buttons are clearly visible on the white background.

constraints: Only change the background styling of the Add New Product modal/panel in AdminDashboardPage.tsx â€” do not alter layout, form fields, or other page sections.
nonGoals: Redesigning the admin dashboard layout or other modal styles.
Changes to any other page or component outside AdminDashboardPage.tsx.
